0.title: ProBoost
0.description: This is a web-based productivity boosting app built with ReactJS. It allows users to create and manage tasks, set deadlines, and track progress. Technology used : HTML, CSS, TailwindCSS, JavaScript, ReactJS, OpenAI API

1.title: We Commerce
1.description: A platform which offers a streamlined solution for building ecommerce websites, utilizing HTML, CSS, Tailwind CSS, JavaScript, Node.js, and Express.js. It enables users to create professional-looking online stores in just minutes.

2.title: Crowd Funding
2.description: A crowdfunding decentralized app made using HTML, CSS, Bootstrap, JavaScript, Web3.JS, truffle, Ganache, Goerli is a platform built on blockchain technology that allows individuals and organizations to raise funds.

3.title: The Shoe Store
3.description: An ecommerce website made using HTML, CSS, JavaScript and ReactJS to deliver a robust, scalable, and visually appealing platform for online shoe shopping.
